name: Red Bit Escape
description:
Escape the space blue squares and make the Red Bit survive as long as possible!

[How to play]
- Drag the RED square with your finger
- Avoid the BLUE enemies, they kill you!
- Don't touch the BLUE laser force field

Survive as long as possible and compare and share your time score with other players or your friends with Game Center Leaderboard!

Enjoy the new impossible Tron style game and...
become the Red Bit Escape master!
